mapper.sql: id, menu_id, data_oper_id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, del_tag, remark
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_menu_data_operate_relation (menu_id, data_oper_id, create_user, create_time, del_tag, remark) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataOperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), #{delTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tbl_menu_data_operate_relation
id,
menu_id,
data_oper_id,
del_tag,
remark,
create_user,
create_time

mapper.update:
update tbl_menu_data_operate_relation
menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_oper_id = #{dataOperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = sysdate()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_menu_data_operate_relation set menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_oper_id = #{dataOperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = sysdate() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_menu_data_operate_relation
del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = sysdate()
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t2.id, t2.`name`, t2.operate_addr, t2.remark from tbl_code_value t1 LEFT JOIN tbl_data_operate t2 on t1.`code` = t2.subgroup and t1.del_tag = '2' and t2.del_tag = '2' LEFT JOIN tbl_menu_data_operate_relation t3 on t2.id=t3.data_oper_id and t3.del_tag = '2' where t1.code_type='dataOperateSubgroup' and t3.menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
